review_data.title: In search of a kebab
review_data.content: The search goes on...whatever they produce here, it is not worth to eat or even look at it. I wish them all the best with their future endeavours and hope it doesn' involve food

review_data.title: Best Dönerlade ever
review_data.content: Absolut tolles Personal, Döner und Pasta schmecken super. Geheimtipp: Gnocchi mit Carbonara -- looove!

review_data.title: Coffe
review_data.content: Nice place to have Latte while away, relax and seat outside on a lovely day. Seats inside also available in cold days.

review_data.title: Best Kebabs in town
review_data.content: Anyone who likes Kebabs...this is the place. Delicious and very fast service..great spot for a quick lunch during work break.

review_data.title: New Döner Restaurant -- cheap but expensive
review_data.content: The Döner served is, if fresh and warm, very tasty. However, for the past few times, when I and my friends were eating: for us, the döner were simply cold, sauce is not equally distributed, and the döner are just by far too small. Hence,...More
